home.headline: Discover Nature's Finest Quality
home.description: From fresh eggs to premium meat, experience the difference that natural, hormone-free goodness brings to every bite.

meat.title: Power Your Body with Every Bite of FerriFresh Quail
meat.subtitle: Discover the exceptional taste and nutrition of premium quail meat - nature's most nutritious protein source

benefits.title: Lean Protein Powerhouse
benefits.description: Quail meat contains 22% protein with only 3% fat, making it an excellent lean protein source for muscle building and weight management.

benefits.title: Heart-Healthy Choice
benefits.description: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and low in cholesterol, quail meat supports cardiovascular health and reduces heart disease risk.

benefits.title: Brain & Memory Boost
benefits.description: High in B vitamins, especially B12 and B6, plus choline that enhances memory, focus, and cognitive function.

benefits.title: Hormone-Free Meat
benefits.description: Our quail are raised naturally without artificial hormones or antibiotics, ensuring pure, clean meat for your family.

benefits.title: Rich in Minerals
benefits.description: Packed with iron, zinc, selenium, and phosphorus - essential minerals for immunity, energy, and overall vitality.

cta.title: You're already holding the best.
cta.subtitle: Choose FerriFresh quail for premium quality and exceptional nutrition you can trust.
cta.description: Your body deserves the superior nutrition that only premium quail meat provides.

benefits.title: Natural & Nutritious
benefits.description: Our Quails are fed a clean, natural diet ‚Äî producing healthier, tastier eggs you can trust.

benefits.title: Complete Protein Source
benefits.description: All 9 essential amino acids in perfect balance for muscle building and recovery.

benefits.title: Brain Health Boost
benefits.description: Rich in choline and omega-3s that support memory, focus, and cognitive function.

benefits.title: Quality Guaranteed
benefits.description: Rigorous quality control ensures every egg meets our premium standards.

cta.title: Nature's most complete food.
